materials.raw_text:
- 7 grams of As (Arsenic)  
 - 1 gram of Fe (Iron)  
 - 2 grams of Li (Lithium)  
 - 3 grams of Mn (Manganese)  
 - 8 grams of Ni (Nickel)

sourcing.instructions:
- Arsenic: Obtain from chemical supply companies or specialized hazardous material suppliers. 
 - Iron: Available at hardware stores or metal suppliers. 
 - Lithium: Can be sourced from battery manufacturers or chemical suppliers. 
 - Manganese: Obtain from metal suppliers or chemical distributors. 
 - Nickel: Available from metal suppliers or industrial chemical suppliers.
